title: Club Lost
body: My EXLED club with a tag of EXLED will not appear in my game, but the club does appear in my phone app. How do I get my club appear back on my pc.

replies.body: Same here as well . i miss my club
I got my club back now, the problem was fixed. Thanks Riot

There was some recent [club downtime ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/nMisJPK8-clubs-outage-oct-2016)that has came back with quite a few club issues since it was restored.  We don't have any etas to share right now, but our clubs team are working towards a solution.  Hang on until that fix arrives!
